sentences.cn: 大减价时的许多廉价商品

sentences.en: Every Lakers game has plots and subplots galore, but s twist was almost stranger than truth.
sentences.cn: 湖人的每场比赛都充满悬念, 但是周日的比赛却早早失去了悬念.
每个小城都有堆积如山的汽车.

sentences.en: Here in the park with picnics galore.
sentences.cn: 在公园这里是个野餐圣地.

sentences.en: On the face of it, dangers galore.
sentences.cn: 从表面上来看, 前途艰险.

sentences.en: Pussy Galore: My name is Pussy Galore.
sentences.cn: 普斯格罗: 我叫普斯格罗.

sentences.en: Suddenly, the instrument started picking up signals galore from high - speed hydrogen atoms streaming from the moon.
sentences.cn: 突然, 这台仪器开始大量获取从月球流出的 高速 氢原子的信号.

sentences.en: There are galore in this town.
There are games for all and prizes galore.
sentences.cn: 我们为每个人都安排了游戏以及丰富的奖品.

sentences.en: There are toughs and drifters galore in this town.
sentences.cn: 这城镇里有很多恶棍和流浪者.

sentences.en: There will be games and prizes galore.
You can prepare as much as you like and amass material galore, but unless you come in fresh, like an athlete onto the track, you aren’t going to do the job required.
sentences.cn: 只要你喜欢，你可以尽量准备、丰富材料，但只有像运动员一样新鲜地走上跑道，你才能保证自己完成工作。

sentences.en: You'll be able to win prizes galore.
